entry.title: [RBX8][HostedPrivateCloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 2, 04:00 - 13:00 UTC

Apr 24, 04:56 UTC
Update - The maintenance has been postponed and has been successfully rescheduled.

Start time : 02/05/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 02/05/2024 13:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 29, 06:00 UTC  -  May 3, 16:00 UTC

Apr 24, 18:41 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware offer.

Start time : 29/04/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 03/05/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for VMware vCenter Server services. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
